values: It's been a while.....nothing of any real imporatnce to report. I found some tape audio journal that my mom makes for herself, heard her crying on them, and a bunch of other random shit. Dad is on some heavy drugs and him and his gf broke up. Ummmm nothing else really imporant to say. life is going fairly well for once...really well if I do say so myself.
Well Sarah you were right, and I was wrong. but theres a twist. Call me up if u care. lates.
We broke up. That is all. =/ "Move away people, theres nothing to see here!" Lates.
I haven't posted in this bitch for a minute...I think later when I accually wake up compeltely I'll post about the last few days.

How to make a Vermillious
Ingredients:
5 parts pride
1 part crazyiness
1 part empathy
Method:
Blend at a low speed for 30 seconds. Serve with a slice of sadness and a pinch of salt. Yum!

From Go-Quiz.com
I'm not goin to Georgia, I'm stayin here.
I wanna meet the beast in your heart that eats away at you. Then let it eat away at me.

This is a questionair I made up...while talkin on the phone. It's called the 5 top 5's. Or....5 by 5, anyway here we go.

1:Pizza

What are your top five turn on's?
1:Passtionate Kissing

I wish for my brothers safty. I hope for my brothers life. I pray for my brothers future. Yet tonight he got into a fight. A fight that caused him to lose 3 of his teeth. He's in alot of pain right now, and I cant help it go away. 

Despite how much I argue with him, or say I hate him. He's my brother, I love him. I dont know what else to feel right now...I dont know what to feel or if to feel anything, but I'm almost crying...later this morning he'll go to the hospital. I hope he'll be ok....


He'll be ok...

Right now my mom's not home, I'm blastin Daryl Hall and John Oats. Chillin and vibin out with my brother. I'm stoned, he's stoned. 

And we're signing Daryl Hall and John Oats. At this moment. I am happy. NO MOM! WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!

Well I dont plan on being here much longer. The road calls my name again. I cant be here. It wasen't time for me to come back. I guess I just missed home so much...but I cant be here right now. 

Now it's either between Canada, or Georgia....hmm I give myself a good year of savin up before I would be able to go. Time to plan this shit out, because if I fuck up on this trip, the tie's I cut with my mother and father, will mean I'm completly on my own....I cant fuck up.

I cant be here any longer. I cant be around here with her, or just this place. I'm tired...I'm tired of being here, I'm tired of seein her goddamn face. I dont want this goddamn family, and I dont want to have anything to do with them. Where to go? Shit anywhere...I've been givin thought about Georgia.....I dunno. I just wanna fade and disapare from this place. To not be her son, to not be anyone's son. To just be Jason.... 

I've spent so much time hatin my life. And well....this is where hate leads me. To hatin her. For her to not understand shit. Gotta stay focused. Job, money...leave. Thats all there is left.
If the music ever stops, I think I may die.
Todays another day. Job hunt, Trance, music, love life. That'll be about it.
